A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Last Jedi Trying to be Empire Strikes Back\, Feels forced and drawn out
mixed feelings\, went from caring about the characters in force awakens to 
we are gonna have to break up I think I wanna see other characters now\, I lost interest in what made the characters lovable they were no longer lovable. When it was over I thought to myself we could have accomplished all this an hour ago...
kids liked it had entertainment value for them but no depth for true fans.
